summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1176, for the improvement of Nineteenth Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Galer Street; East Aloha Street, from Eighteenth Avenue North to Nineteenth Avenue North; East Prospect Street, from Seventeenth Avenue North to Nineteenth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing, constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks, water mains of proper dimensions, together with gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 12992 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
